alert.note: Alert for Corson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 2:11PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Oak Creek near Wakpala affecting Corson County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Oak Creek near Wakpala. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 PM MDT Thursday was 10.6 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Friday evening by 1015 PM MDT.
